openFocusedEditor.label: Open in a New Window and Focus

message.nonStandardURL: is not standardized, please enter the URL address of the specification

background.description: The background color or background image of the web page
background.title: Web Page Background

reset.description: Reset all settings options to default (The page will be refreshed after resetting)
reset.title: Reset settings options

useragent.description: Use custom User-Agent, leave this item blank to use the default User-Agent (Only desktop client)
useragent.title: User-Agent (UA)

tab.description: Open the hyperlink in a new tab (Only desktop client)
tab.title: Enable

window.description: Open the hyperlink in a new window
window.title: Enable

editorType.description: The type of SiYuan editor that opens in a new window by default
editorType.title: Editor Type

enable.description: Open SiYuan Editor in a new window
enable.title: Enable

focus.description: Whether the SiYuan editor opened in a new window is focused by default
focus.title: Focus

desktop.description: Open a window of SiYuan desktop editor
desktop.title: Desktop Editor

mobile.description: Open a window of SiYuan mobile editor
mobile.title: Mobile Editor

height.description: The default height of the new window
height.title: Window Height

menuBar.description: The visible state of the menu bar
menuBar.title: Menu Bar

top.description: Whether new windows are pinned to the top by default
top.title: Window Top

width.description: The default width of the new window
width.title: Window Width
